# addCompletion(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds the specified completion block to the animator.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func addCompletion(_ completion: @escaping () -> Void)
```

## Parameters

- **completion**: The completion block.

## Adding Custom Animations

- **addAnimations(_:)**: Adds the specified animation block to the animator.
